text: mod_remoteip should also change %h in logs instead of just %a
creator: msporleder@gmail.com

text: This has the additional perverse effect of treating Require host differently than Require ip, and was a side-effect of refactoring the remote ip/host into two sets of connection and request based ip and host.  The solution is likely a fix in httpd core, although mod_remoteip could inflict a performance penalty to perform this lookup for every request, whether it is examined or not.
